name: ApexLegends Launcher(pixel) For Fun by zenax6 aka OfficialMrJz
name_original: ApexLegends Launcher(pixel) For Fun by zenax6 aka OfficialMrJz
description:
This is a very short Apex Legends Launcher with Pixel-art touch. Made just for fun. In First Screen only works Ready Button. 

To Exit From Scene Press ESC Button or start game.

I hope its gonna make you laugh.

Have a good day.

Ps. Legend Pixel art downloaded from:

https://www.reddit.com/r/PixelArt/comments/b4ovnb/oc_bloodhound_from_apex_legend...

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/A96qzy

https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&ved=2ahUKEwi_2...

credit  goes to corresponding artists.

Other Sprites are drawn by myself.
